## Introduction

In this document we are going to import and summarize transcript-level estimates produced by Salmon for gene-level analysis.

## Setup

Set chunk options:

```{r knitr}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  autodep    = TRUE,
  cache      = TRUE,
  cache.path = "cache/01-import",
  dev        = "png",
  error      = FALSE,
  message    = FALSE,
  warning    = FALSE
)
```

Load required packages:

```{r pacman}
pacman::p_load(
  devtools, 
  here, 
  readr, 
  tximport
)
```

## Summary

### Output

Write SingleCellExperiment object to file:

```{r}
write_rds(sce, here("data/import.Rds"))
```

### Session

Print session information:

```{r}
session_info()
```
